toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText:
Start date of period whose pay is paid on first Pay day (falls in the Tax period starting April 6).
e.g.
- Monthly: Pay period 1 normally starts April 1 but could begin in an earlier month
- Weekly: Pay period 1 could start early April or late March
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Pay period 1 starts
